FuncDef: The receive-time command makes a key act as a receive-key for the specified interval of time. The receive-time command makes a key act as a receive-key for the specified interval of time. By default, no receive-time is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the month of the year to be configured as the start receive month for the given key.
The value ranges from January to December.janfebmaraprmayjunjulaugsepoctnovdec

Specifies the end receive month.
The value ranges from February to December.febmaraprmayjunjulaugsepoctnovdec

The end month should be later than the start month.

Specifies the months of the year.
-

ExtraInfo: Each keychain consists of multiple key IDs that are valid within different time periods and each key ID is configured with an authentication algorithm. When a key ID becomes valid, the corresponding authentication algorithm is used, ensuring the dynamic change of authentication algorithms. Configure different key IDs for packet sending and receiving to be valid within different time periods.
